article: We have a big playground in our school.We all like to _ games there after school.It's Friday.We have only two classes _ the afternoon.When school is _ ,a lot of students go to the playground.Look!The boys of Grade Two are _ a basketball match.Some girls are _ and shouting .Football is our favorite sport.Many teachers are also playing football.Li Ming,Li Lei and Wei Fang are students of Grade One.They are _ volleyball.They are playing very _ .It's half past five now.It's time to go home.The students all leave the playground.
